_meta.description: MARC27 platform provider catalog. Auth-gated, native API, and dataset providers available through the PRISM platform. These are Layer 3 sources â€” separate from OPTIMADE auto-discovery.

mp_native.name: Materials Project (Native API)
mp_native.description: Direct access to MP's REST API with richer query capabilities than OPTIMADE. Requires API key from materialsproject.org.

platform.install: Set MP_API_KEY env var. Get key at materialsproject.org/dashboard

aflow_native.name: AFLOW (Native AFLUX API)
aflow_native.description: Automatic FLOW for materials discovery. 3.5M+ compounds via the AFLUX REST API. OPTIMADE endpoint is broken (HTTP 500), native API works.

platform.notes: Requires AflowProvider implementation. AFLUX API confirmed working (2026-02-25).

mpds.name: Materials Platform for Data Science
mpds.description: Curated experimental and computational materials data. Requires paid MPDS subscription.

platform.notes: Requires MpdsProvider implementation and paid subscription.

omat24.name: Open Materials 2024 (Meta FAIR)
omat24.description: 110M DFT calculations from Meta FAIR. Derived from Alexandria structures. ML interatomic potentials + relaxation trajectories.

platform.notes: Requires DatasetProvider implementation + local download from HuggingFace. ~500GB full dataset.
